alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 9:24PM MDT until April 19 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Southern Foot Hills, the Custer County Plains, the Fall River County Plains and the Hermosa Foot Hills. * WHEN...From 2 AM to noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Foot Hills
